scripts.build: npm run build:clean && node_modules/.bin/tsc && npm run build:static
scripts.build:static: cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist && cp .npmignore dist
scripts.build:lambda: rm -rf lambda.zip && rm -rf dist_lambda && cp -R dist dist_lambda && rm -rf dist_lambda/examples && rm -rf dist_lambda/test && cd dist_lambda && npm install --production && zip -r lambda.zip . && mv lambda.zip ../ && cd .. && rm -rf dist_lambda
scripts.publish:lambda: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name teste1 --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip && rm lambda.zip
scripts.buildAndTest: npm run build && npm run test:coverage
scripts.setnpmtokenAndPublish: npm run setnpmtoken && npm run publish:npm
